```{r setup}
library(graph)
library(loon)
library(tidyverse)
library(PairViz)
library(zenplots)
library(dbscan)
library(mclust)
library(factoextra)
```
```{r data}
df_sky=read.csv("var_for_clustering.csv")
df_fz=read.csv("ozone_averages.csv")
df_sky_clean=df_sky%>%mutate(team=teaminpossession)%>%select(team,mean_time,mean_time_mod,mean_pass,mean_pass_mod)
df=full_join(df_sky_clean,df_fz,by = join_by(team))
```

After reading data from both source and combine into df, lets do analysis with loon.

## Try PCA

```{r}
pca_result=prcomp(df,scale. = T)
summary(pca_result)
plot(pca_result, type = "l", main = "Scree Plot")
reduced_df=pca_result$x[,1:5]
pca_result$x
elbowMethod=function(k,data){
  vector_wcss=c()
  for (i in 1:k){
    k_means_result=kmeans(data,centers=k)
    wcss=sum(k_means_result$withins)
    vector_wcss=c(vector_wcss,wcss)
  }
  return(vector_wcss)
}
ng <- l_navgraph(reduced_df)
cluster_result=data.frame(team=df$team,visual_manual=as.numeric(factor(ng["color"]$plot)))
df[ng["selected"]$plot,]
```

```{r hierarchical}
df_scaled=scale(df)
df_dist=dist(df_scaled)
hier_out=hclust(df_dist,method="complete")
plot(hier_out)
cluster_hier=cutree(hier_out,k=3)
cluster_result$hierarchical=cluster_hier
```

```{r kmeans}
k_means_result=kmeans(df_scaled,centers=3)
cluster_result$kmeans=k_means_result$cluster
```

```{r dbscan}
dbscan_result = dbscan(df_scaled, eps = 3.7, minPts = 3)
dbscan_result
```
dbscan does not work well....

```{r gmm}
gmm_result=Mclust(df_scaled)
gmm_result_6=Mclust(df_scaled,G=6)
gmm_cluster=gmm_result$classification
cluster_result$gmm= gmm_cluster
cluster_result$gmm_6=gmm_result_6$classification
```

noticed that the clusters are errily similar to manual ones

```{r final}
gmm_manual=cluster_result%>%select(team,visual_manual,gmm_6)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 6, 7, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 1, 8, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 3, 9, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 4, 10, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 5, 11, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$visual_manual <- ifelse(gmm_manual$visual_manual == 2, 12, gmm_manual$visual_manual)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 1, 7, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 2, 8, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 3, 9, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 4, 11, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 5, 10, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_manual$gmm_6 <- ifelse(gmm_manual$gmm_6 == 6, 12, gmm_manual$gmm_6)
gmm_and_manual=gmm_manual-6
gmm_and_manual$team=gmm_and_manual$team+6
gmm_and_manual$isSame=gmm_and_manual$visual_manual==gmm_and_manual$gmm_6
```
